external_references.description: Rufus Brown, Van Ta, Douglas Bienstock, Geoff Ackerman, John Wolfram. (2022, March 8). Does This Look Infected? A Summary of APT41 Targeting U.S. State Governments. Retrieved July 8, 2022.

description: During [C0017](https://attack.mitre.org/campaigns/C0017), [APT41](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0096) used dead drop resolvers on two separate tech community forums for their [KEYPLUG](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1051) Windows-version backdoor; notably [APT41](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0096) updated the community forum posts frequently with new dead drop resolvers during the campaign.(Citation: Mandiant APT41)
